articles-single: Here you can find thoughts and opinions on the software industry, leadership, music, programming, tech, and sometimes politics and my personal life. Until now, I wrote {{value, number}} articles. Remember: this content is always available in English and Spanish to open it to the more audience possible. Don't forget share it!
